sentences.en: And our own species, Homo sapiens.
sentences.cn: 而我们自己所属的人种, 就是智人.

sentences.en: Do you mean People magazine or members of the genus Homo?
sentences.cn: 人是指[人]员,还是指《时人》杂志?

sentences.en: Homo erectus hunt with wooden tools?
sentences.cn: 直立人是用木器打猎 吗 ?

sentences.en: Homo sapiens did not evolve with cookies and soda at the fingertips.
sentences.cn: 我们可能会说,当今时代的人不是伴随着指尖的饼干和苏打进化而来.

sentences.en: Homo urbanus did not just live in a town: he was urbane.
sentences.cn: 城市人属的区别不仅仅是在城镇生活,还有他更为有教养.

sentences.en: It also possesses a HOMO level of - 5.21 eV, which will be benefitial to hole - injection.
sentences.cn: 同时它也具有较高的HOMO能级-5.21eV, 使得它具有较好的空穴注入能力.

sentences.en: Language sets homo sapiens apart from all other animals.
sentences.cn: 语言能力使人区别于其他所有动物.

sentences.en: Later Homo sapiens evolved four main races ( white, yellow, brown and black ).
sentences.cn: 后来,智人又进化出四大人种,他们就是今天的白人 、 黄种人 、 棕色人种和黑人.

sentences.en: Not like Ecce Homo , crown of thorns and cross.
sentences.cn: 不同于头戴荆冠、钉在十字架上的.

sentences.en: The energy difference Δ E _ (( LUMO - HOMO )) of the molecular systems was employed to analyze the stability of isomers.
sentences.cn: 并 根据 分子体系的能级差ΔE( LUMO -HOMO)判断了同分异构体的稳定性关系.

sentences.en: The LUMO of cations interact with the HOMO of anions to form ionic liquid molecules.
sentences.cn: 烷基季铵盐阳离子的LUMO与 阴离子的HOMO相互作用形成离子液体.

sentences.en: They named these ancient humans Homo floresiensis.
sentences.cn: 他们给这些远古人类命名为”弗拉里人”.

sentences.en: Were these the bones of ancestors of modern Homo sapiens?
sentences.cn: 难道那就是现代人类祖先的骨头 吗 ?

sentences.en: What distinguishes homo sapiens from every other living creature is the mind.
sentences.cn: 智人和其他生物的区别在于大脑。

sentences.en: Wisely or not , Homo sapiens has become Homo urbanus.
sentences.cn: 明智与否, 人类成为了城市人属.

trans.tran_en: a very offensive word for a  homosexual
